title: Section Leader - Code in Place (CIP)
summary_text: Facilitated student learning in Python through Stanford's global volunteer-driven Code in Place program · Stanford Online · Apr 2023 - Apr 2024

details.description_full: Participated as a Section Leader in Stanford’s global volunteer-driven Code in Place program, aimed at democratizing access to computer science education. The initiative involved guiding and supporting a small cohort of learners through Python programming fundamentals as part of Stanford's renowned CS106A course. The program combines human-centered teaching with scalable online learning, recruiting and training volunteer instructors worldwide to create an inclusive and engaging learning environment.

title: Scientific Journal Reviewer
organization: European Alliance of Medical and Biological Engineering and Science (EAMBES)
summary_text: Actively involved in peer-review of scientific manuscripts for journals affiliated with EAMBES · European Alliance of Medical and Biological Engineering and Science (EAMBES) · Aug 2023 - Present

details.description_full: Contributed to the scientific community by critically reviewing research manuscripts submitted to prestigious journals under the EAMBES umbrella. Key journals include: 1. Biomedical Signal Processing and Control (BSPC) – ISSN: 1746-8094 [link] 2. Computers & Electrical Engineering – ISSN: 0045-7906 [link] Reviews were conducted with an emphasis on scientific merit, originality, and clarity, contributing to the integrity and advancement of biomedical and engineering research.
